desc: Mr. and Ms. Weekend is the home of sustainable, one of a kind handcrafted apparel. Cut from vintage quilts, ethically sourced organic and recycled textiles, each piece is season-less and designed for casual, cool and hip women.

layout.text: Welcome to Mr. and Ms. Weekend; the home of hip sustainable handcrafted clothing. Each piece is made from vintage, antique and organic textiles in our seaside studio in New Zealand. Unique in color, pattern and design, these one of a kind garments transcend the test of time, giving you a lifetime of wear. Come join the weekend crew and get hip to the slow fashion movement.
